ModMetaData.name: LMC021.弱化版便携式发电机
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html It's lightweight, it's portable, it doesn't stop giving power when the sun goes down or when the wind stops blowing and it doesn't even cause deforestation. 它重量轻，便于携带，太阳下山或无风时也不会停止供电，而且无需补充燃料，环保是最重要的。 Nerfed version of Terry Crews, what else do you need?! 弱化版的便携式发电机，有了它，你还需要其他发电机干什么呢？！ 汉化：jxb12306
